author: .vbuterin
content: 3074 is very much NOT "account abstraction" or a substitute for it

author: .vbuterin
content: It does useful things that can improve user experience and even reduce gas costs for many applications, but it's not solving the same problem

author: .vbuterin
content: the core problem that account abstraction is trying to solve being, allowing evm code to decide whether or not a transaction pays gas

author: .vbuterin
content: One alternative route is to talk to the rollup teams, eg. Optimism has been thinking about smart contract wallets

author: .vbuterin
content: I think the best thing we need at this point is to just have a user wallet with enough features but also enough simplicity that everyone is okay rallying around
